overview: In the feature-length documentary SOAP LIFE, producers John Grossman and Matthew Dâ€™Amato attempt to find out why, with millions of viewers, these icons of American culture are disappearing from the television landscape. SOAP LIFE features interviews with actors, directors, producers, writers, and fans to get their perspective on the changing face of daytime television.
tagline: Once a cornerstone of network television, the American soap opera has fallen on hard times and cancellations.
title: Soap Life
